174 int SystemSolver::m_nInstances = 0;
175 bool SystemSolver::m_optionsEditable = true;
176 bool SystemSolver::m_logViewEnabled = false;
177 std::vector<std::string> SystemSolver::m_options = std::vector<std::string>(1, "bitpit");
178 
184 void SystemSolver::addInitOption(const std::string &option)
185 {
186  if (!m_optionsEditable) {
187  throw std::runtime_error("Initialization opions can be set only before initializing the solver.");
188  }
189 
190  m_options.push_back(option);
191 }
192 
207 void SystemSolver::addInitOptions(int argc, char **argv)
208 {
209  if (!m_optionsEditable) {
210  throw std::runtime_error("Initialization opions can be set only before initializing the solver.");
211  }
212 
213  for (int i = 1; i < argc; ++i) {
214  m_options.push_back(argv[i]);
215  }
216 }
217 
223 void SystemSolver::addInitOptions(const std::vector<std::string> &options)
224 {
225  if (!m_optionsEditable) {
226  throw std::runtime_error("Initialization opions can be set only before initializing the solver.");
227  }
228 
229  for (const std::string &option : options) {
230  m_options.push_back(option);
231  }
232 }
233 
237 void SystemSolver::clearInitOptions()
238 {
239  m_options.clear();
240 }
241 
247 void SystemSolver::enableLogView()
248 {
249  if (m_logViewEnabled) {
250  return;
251  }
252 
253 #if (PETSC_VERSION_MAJOR >= 3 && PETSC_VERSION_MINOR >= 7)
254  PetscLogDefaultBegin();
255 #else
256  PetscLogBegin();
257 #endif
258  PetscRegisterFinalize(&(SystemSolver::displayLogView));
259  m_logViewEnabled = true;
260 }
261 
267 PetscErrorCode SystemSolver::displayLogView()
268 {
269  return PetscLogView(PETSC_VIEWER_STDOUT_WORLD);
270 }
271 
277 SystemSolver::SystemSolver(bool debug)
278  : SystemSolver("", debug)
279 {
280 }
281 
288 SystemSolver::SystemSolver(const std::string &prefix, bool debug)
289  : m_A(nullptr), m_rhs(nullptr), m_solution(nullptr),
290  m_KSP(nullptr),
291  m_prefix(prefix), m_assembled(false), m_setUp(false),
292 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
293  m_communicator(MPI_COMM_SELF), m_partitioned(false),
294  m_rowGlobalOffset(0), m_colGlobalOffset(0),
295 #endif
296  m_rowPermutation(nullptr), m_colPermutation(nullptr)
297 {
298  // Initialize Petsc
299  if (m_nInstances == 0) {
300  // Generate command line arguments
301  //
302  // The first argument is the executable name and it is set to a
303  // dummy value.
304  std::string help = "None";
305  std::string programName = "bitpit_system_solver";
306 
307  int argc = 1 + m_options.size();
308  char **argv = new char*[argc + 1];
309  argv[0] = strdup(programName.data());
310  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < m_options.size(); i++) {
311  argv[1 + i] = strdup(m_options[i].data());
312  }
313  argv[argc] = nullptr;
314 
315  // Call initialization
316  PetscInitialize(&argc, &argv, 0, help.data());
317 
318  // Clean-up
319  for (int i = 0; i < argc; ++i) {
320  free(argv[i]);
321  }
322 
323  delete[] argv;
324  }
325 
326  // Set KSP debug options
327  if (debug) {
328  enableLogView();
329 
330 #if (PETSC_VERSION_MAJOR >= 3 && PETSC_VERSION_MINOR >= 7)
331  PetscOptionsSetValue(nullptr, ("-" + m_prefix + "ksp_monitor_true_residual").c_str(), "");
332  PetscOptionsSetValue(nullptr, ("-" + m_prefix + "ksp_converged_reason").c_str(), "");
333  PetscOptionsSetValue(nullptr, ("-" + m_prefix + "ksp_monitor_singular_value").c_str(), "");
334 #else
335  PetscOptionsSetValue(("-" + m_prefix + "ksp_monitor_true_residual").c_str(), "");
336  PetscOptionsSetValue(("-" + m_prefix + "ksp_converged_reason").c_str(), "");
337  PetscOptionsSetValue(("-" + m_prefix + "ksp_monitor_singular_value").c_str(), "");
338 #endif
339  }
340 
341  // Increase the number of instances
342  ++m_nInstances;
343 }
344 
348 SystemSolver::~SystemSolver()
349 {
350  // Clear the solver
351  clear();
352 
353  // Reset the permutations
354  resetPermutations();
355 
356  // Decrease the number of instances
357  --m_nInstances;
358 
359  // Finalize petsc
360  if (m_nInstances == 0) {
361  PetscBool isPetscFinalized;
362  PetscFinalized(&isPetscFinalized);
363  if (!isPetscFinalized) {
364  PetscFinalize();
365  }
366  }
367 }
368 
372 void SystemSolver::clear()
373 {
374  if (isSetUp()) {
375  KSPDestroy(&m_KSP);
376  m_KSP = nullptr;
377 
378  m_setUp = false;
379  }
380 
381  if (isAssembled()) {
382  MatDestroy(&m_A);
383  VecDestroy(&m_rhs);
384  VecDestroy(&m_solution);
385 
386 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
387  freeCommunicator();
388 #endif
389 
390  m_assembled = false;
391  }
392 
393  if (m_nInstances == 0) {
394  m_optionsEditable = true;
395  }
396 }
397 
408 void SystemSolver::setPermutations(long nRows, const long *rowRanks, long nCols, const long *colRanks)
409 {
410  // Permutation has to be set before assembling the system
411  if (isAssembled()) {
412  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to set the permutations. The system is already assembled.");
413  }
414 
415  // Reset existing permutations
416  resetPermutations();
417 
418  // Create new permutations
419  PetscInt *rowPermutationsStorage;
420  PetscMalloc(nRows * sizeof(PetscInt), &rowPermutationsStorage);
421  for (long i = 0; i < nRows; ++i) {
422  rowPermutationsStorage[i] = rowRanks[i];
423  }
424 
425 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
426  ISCreateGeneral(m_communicator, nRows, rowPermutationsStorage, PETSC_OWN_POINTER, &m_rowPermutation);
427 #else
428  ISCreateGeneral(PETSC_COMM_SELF, nRows, rowPermutationsStorage, PETSC_OWN_POINTER, &m_rowPermutation);
429 #endif
430  ISSetPermutation(m_rowPermutation);
431 
432  PetscInt *colPermutationsStorage;
433  PetscMalloc(nCols * sizeof(PetscInt), &colPermutationsStorage);
434  for (long j = 0; j < nCols; ++j) {
435  colPermutationsStorage[j] = colRanks[j];
436  }
437 
438 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
439  ISCreateGeneral(m_communicator, nCols, colPermutationsStorage, PETSC_OWN_POINTER, &m_colPermutation);
440 #else
441  ISCreateGeneral(PETSC_COMM_SELF, nCols, colPermutationsStorage, PETSC_OWN_POINTER, &m_colPermutation);
442 #endif
443  ISSetPermutation(m_colPermutation);
444 }
445 
449 void SystemSolver::resetPermutations()
450 {
451  if (m_rowPermutation) {
452  ISDestroy(&m_rowPermutation);
453  }
454 
455  if (m_colPermutation) {
456  ISDestroy(&m_colPermutation);
457  }
458 }
459 
465 void SystemSolver::assembly(const SparseMatrix &matrix)
466 {
467  // Check if the matrix is assembled
468  if (!matrix.isAssembled()) {
469  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to assembly the system. The matrix is not yet assembled.");
470  }
471 
472  // Assembly the system matrix
473  SystemSparseMatrixAssembler assembler(&matrix);
474 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
475  assembly(matrix.getCommunicator(), matrix.isPartitioned(), assembler);
476 #else
477  assembly(assembler);
478 #endif
479 }
480 
481 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
487 void SystemSolver::assembly(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
488 {
489  assembly(MPI_COMM_SELF, false, assembler);
490 }
491 
499 void SystemSolver::assembly(MPI_Comm communicator, bool isPartitioned, const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
500 {
501 #else
507 void SystemSolver::assembly(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
508 {
509 #endif
510  // Clear the system
511  clear();
512 
513 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
514  // Set the communicator
515  setCommunicator(communicator);
516 
517  // Detect if the system is partitioned
518  m_partitioned = isPartitioned;
519 #endif
520 
521  // Initialize matrix
522  matrixCreate(assembler);
523  matrixFill(assembler);
524 
525  // Initialize RHS and solution vectors
526  vectorsCreate();
527 
528  // The system is now assembled
529  m_assembled = true;
530 }
531 
540 void SystemSolver::update(const SparseMatrix &elements)
541 {
542  update(getRowCount(), nullptr, elements);
543 }
544 
555 void SystemSolver::update(long nRows, const long *rows, const SparseMatrix &elements)
556 {
557  // Check if the element storage is assembled
558  if (!elements.isAssembled()) {
559  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to update the system. The element storage is not yet assembled.");
560  }
561 
562  // Update matrix
563  SystemSparseMatrixAssembler assembler(&elements);
564  update(nRows, rows, assembler);
565 }
566 
575 void SystemSolver::update(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
576 {
577  update(getRowCount(), nullptr, assembler);
578 }
579 
590 void SystemSolver::update(long nRows, const long *rows, const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
591 {
592  // Check if the system is assembled
593  if (!isAssembled()) {
594  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to update the system. The system is not yet assembled.");
595  }
596 
597  // Update matrix
598  matrixUpdate(nRows, rows, assembler);
599 }
600 
606 long SystemSolver::getRowCount() const
607 {
608  if (!isAssembled()) {
609  return 0;
610  }
611 
612  PetscInt nRows;
613  MatGetLocalSize(m_A, &nRows, NULL);
614 
615  return nRows;
616 }
617

624 {
625  if (!isAssembled()) {
626  return 0;
627  }
628 
629  PetscInt nCols;
630  MatGetLocalSize(m_A, NULL, &nCols);
631 
632  return nCols;
633 }

644  return 0;
645  }

647  PetscInt nRows;
648  MatGetSize(m_A, &nRows, NULL);
649 
650  return nRows;

661  return 0;
662  }

666 
667  return nCols;

675 bool SystemSolver::isPartitioned() const
676 {
677  return m_partitioned;
678 }
679 #endif

686 bool SystemSolver::isAssembled() const
687 {
688  return m_assembled;

696 bool SystemSolver::isSetUp() const
697 {
698  return m_setUp;

700 
704 void SystemSolver::solve()
705 {
706  // Check if the system is assembled
707  if (!isAssembled()) {
708  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to solve the system. The system is not yet assembled.");
709  }
710 
711  // Check if the system is set up
712  if (!isSetUp()) {
713  setUp();
714  }
715 
716  // Perfrom actions before KSP solution
717  preKSPSolveActions();
718 
719  // Solve the system
720  m_KSPStatus.error = KSPSolve(m_KSP, m_rhs, m_solution);
721 
722  // Set solver info
723  if (m_KSPStatus.error == 0) {
724  KSPGetIterationNumber(m_KSP, &m_KSPStatus.its);
725  KSPGetConvergedReason(m_KSP, &m_KSPStatus.convergence);
726  } else {
727  m_KSPStatus.its = -1;
728  m_KSPStatus.convergence = KSP_DIVERGED_BREAKDOWN;
729  }
730 
731  // Perfrom actions after KSP solution
732  postKSPSolveActions();
733 }
734 
742 void SystemSolver::solve(const std::vector<double> &rhs, std::vector<double> *solution)
743 {
744  // Fills the vectors
745  vectorsFill(rhs, solution);
746 
747  // Solve the system
748  solve();
749 
750  // Export the solution
751  vectorsExport(solution);
752 }
753 
757 void SystemSolver::preKSPSolveActions()
758 {
759  // Apply permutations
760  vectorsPermute(false);
761 }
762 
766 void SystemSolver::postKSPSolveActions()
767 {
768  // Invert permutations
769  vectorsPermute(true);
770 }
771 
777 void SystemSolver::matrixCreate(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
778 {
779  const PetscInt *rowRanks = nullptr;
780  if (m_rowPermutation) {
781  ISGetIndices(m_rowPermutation, &rowRanks);
782  }
783 
784  // Set sizes
785  long nRows = assembler.getRowCount();
786  long nCols = assembler.getColCount();
787 
788 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
789  long nGlobalRows = assembler.getRowGlobalCount();
790  long nGlobalCols = assembler.getColGlobalCount();
791 #endif
792 
793 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
794  // Set row and column global offset
795  m_rowGlobalOffset = assembler.getRowGlobalOffset();
796  m_colGlobalOffset = assembler.getColGlobalOffset();
797 #endif
798 
799  // Preallocation information
800  std::vector<int> d_nnz(nRows, 0);
801 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
802  std::vector<int> o_nnz(nRows, 0);
803 
804  long firstColGlobalId = m_colGlobalOffset;
805  long lastColGlobalId = firstColGlobalId + nCols - 1;
806 
807  ConstProxyVector<long> rowPattern;
808 #endif
809 
810  for (long row = 0; row < nRows; ++row) {
811  long matrixRow = row;
812  if (m_rowPermutation) {
813  matrixRow = rowRanks[matrixRow];
814  }
815 
816  d_nnz[row] = assembler.getRowNZCount(matrixRow);
817 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
818  if (m_partitioned) {
819  assembler.getRowPattern(matrixRow, &rowPattern);
820 
821  int nRowNZ = rowPattern.size();
822  for (int k = 0; k < nRowNZ; ++k) {
823  long columnGlobalId = rowPattern[k];
824  if (columnGlobalId < firstColGlobalId || columnGlobalId > lastColGlobalId) {
825  ++o_nnz[row];
826  }
827  }
828 
829  d_nnz[row] -= o_nnz[row];
830  }
831 #endif
832  }
833 
834  // Create the matrix
835 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
836  MatCreateAIJ(m_communicator, nRows, nCols, nGlobalRows, nGlobalCols, 0, d_nnz.data(), 0, o_nnz.data(), &m_A);
837 #else
838  MatCreateSeqAIJ(PETSC_COMM_SELF, nRows, nCols, 0, d_nnz.data(), &m_A);
839 #endif
840 
841  // Cleanup
842  if (m_rowPermutation) {
843  ISRestoreIndices(m_rowPermutation, &rowRanks);
844  }
845 }
846 
852 void SystemSolver::matrixFill(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
853 {
854  const long nRows = assembler.getRowCount();
855  const long nCols = assembler.getColCount();
856  const long maxRowNZ = assembler.getMaxRowNZCount();
857 
858  const PetscInt *rowRanks = nullptr;
859  if (m_rowPermutation) {
860  ISGetIndices(m_rowPermutation, &rowRanks);
861  }
862 
863  IS invColPermutation;
864  const PetscInt *colInvRanks = nullptr;
865  if (m_colPermutation) {
866  ISInvertPermutation(m_colPermutation, nCols, &invColPermutation);
867  ISGetIndices(invColPermutation, &colInvRanks);
868  }
869 
870  // Create the matrix
871  if (maxRowNZ > 0) {
872  std::vector<PetscInt> rowNZGlobalIds(maxRowNZ);
873  std::vector<PetscScalar> rowNZValues(maxRowNZ);
874 
875  long rowGlobalOffset;
876 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
877  rowGlobalOffset = m_rowGlobalOffset;
878 #else
879  rowGlobalOffset = 0;
880 #endif
881 
882  long firstGlobalCol = rowGlobalOffset;
883  long lastGlobalCol = firstGlobalCol + nCols - 1;
884 
885  ConstProxyVector<long> rowPattern;
886  ConstProxyVector<double> rowValues;
887  for (long row = 0; row < nRows; ++row) {
888  long matrixRow = row;
889  if (m_rowPermutation) {
890  matrixRow = rowRanks[matrixRow];
891  }
892 
893  assembler.getRowPattern(matrixRow, &rowPattern);
894  assembler.getRowValues(matrixRow, &rowValues);
895 
896  const int nRowNZ = rowPattern.size();
897  const PetscInt globalRow = rowGlobalOffset + row;
898  for (int k = 0; k < nRowNZ; ++k) {
899  long matrixGlobalCol = rowPattern[k];
900 
901  long globalCol = matrixGlobalCol;
902  if (m_colPermutation) {
903  if (globalCol >= firstGlobalCol && globalCol <= lastGlobalCol) {
904  long col = globalCol - firstGlobalCol;
905  col = colInvRanks[col];
906  globalCol = firstGlobalCol + col;
907  }
908  }
909 
910  rowNZGlobalIds[k] = globalCol;
911  rowNZValues[k] = rowValues[k];
912  }
913 
914  MatSetValues(m_A, 1, &globalRow, nRowNZ, rowNZGlobalIds.data(), rowNZValues.data(), INSERT_VALUES);
915  }
916  }
917 
918  // Let petsc build the matrix
919  MatAssemblyBegin(m_A, MAT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY);
920  MatAssemblyEnd(m_A, MAT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY);
921 
922  // No new allocations are now allowed
923  //
924  // When updating the matrix it will not be possible to alter the pattern,
925  // it will be possible to change only the values.
926  MatSetOption(m_A, MAT_NEW_NONZERO_LOCATIONS, PETSC_FALSE);
927 
928  // Cleanup
929  if (m_rowPermutation) {
930  ISRestoreIndices(m_rowPermutation, &rowRanks);
931  }
932 
933  if (m_colPermutation) {
934  ISDestroy(&invColPermutation);
935  }
936 }
937 
950 void SystemSolver::matrixUpdate(long nRows, const long *rows, const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler)
951 {
952  // Update element values
953  long rowGlobalOffset;
954 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
955  rowGlobalOffset = m_rowGlobalOffset;
956 #else
957  rowGlobalOffset = 0;
958 #endif
959 
960  const long maxRowNZ = std::max(assembler.getMaxRowNZCount(), 0L);
961 
962  std::vector<PetscInt> rawRowPattern(maxRowNZ);
963  std::vector<PetscScalar> rawRowValues(maxRowNZ);
964 
965  ConstProxyVector<long> rowPattern;
966  ConstProxyVector<double> rowValues;
967  for (long n = 0; n < nRows; ++n) {
968  assembler.getRowValues(n, &rowValues);
969  const int nRowElements = rowValues.size();
970  if (nRowElements == 0) {
971  continue;
972  }
973 
974  // Get global row
975  long row;
976  if (rows) {
977  row = rows[n];
978  } else {
979  row = n;
980  }
981 
982  const PetscInt globalRow = rowGlobalOffset + row;
983 
984  // Get pattern
985  assembler.getRowPattern(n, &rowPattern);
986 
987  // Update values
988  for (int k = 0; k < nRowElements; ++k) {
989  rawRowPattern[k] = rowPattern[k];;
990  rawRowValues[k] = rowValues[k];
991  }
992 
993  MatSetValues(m_A, 1, &globalRow, nRowElements, rawRowPattern.data(), rawRowValues.data(), INSERT_VALUES);
994  }
995 
996  // Let petsc assembly the matrix after the update
997  MatAssemblyBegin(m_A, MAT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY);
998  MatAssemblyEnd(m_A, MAT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY);
999 }
1000 
1004 void SystemSolver::vectorsCreate()
1005 {
1006  PetscInt nRows;
1007  PetscInt nColumns;
1008  MatGetLocalSize(m_A, &nRows, &nColumns);
1009 
1010 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
1011  PetscInt nGlobalRows;
1012  PetscInt nGlobalColumns;
1013  MatGetSize(m_A, &nGlobalRows, &nGlobalColumns);
1014 
1015  PetscInt nGhosts;
1016  const PetscInt *ghosts;
1017  MatGetGhosts(m_A, &nGhosts, &ghosts);
1018 
1019  VecCreateGhost(m_communicator, nColumns, nGlobalColumns, nGhosts, ghosts, &m_solution);
1020  VecCreateGhost(m_communicator, nRows, nGlobalRows, nGhosts, ghosts, &m_rhs);
1021 #else
1022  VecCreateSeq(PETSC_COMM_SELF, nColumns, &m_solution);
1023  VecCreateSeq(PETSC_COMM_SELF, nRows, &m_rhs);
1024 #endif
1025 }
1026 
1032 void SystemSolver::vectorsPermute(bool invert)
1033 {
1034  PetscBool petscInvert;
1035  if (invert) {
1036  petscInvert = PETSC_TRUE;
1037  } else {
1038  petscInvert = PETSC_FALSE;
1039  }
1040 
1041  if (m_colPermutation) {
1042  VecPermute(m_solution, m_colPermutation, petscInvert);
1043  }
1044 
1045  if (m_rowPermutation) {
1046  VecPermute(m_rhs, m_rowPermutation, petscInvert);
1047  }
1048 }
1049 
1056 void SystemSolver::vectorsFill(const std::vector<double> &rhs, std::vector<double> *solution)
1057 {
1058  // Import RHS
1059  int nRows;
1060  VecGetLocalSize(m_rhs, &nRows);
1061 
1062  PetscScalar *raw_rhs;
1063  VecGetArray(m_rhs, &raw_rhs);
1064  for (int i = 0; i < nRows; ++i) {
1065  raw_rhs[i] = rhs[i];
1066  }
1067  VecRestoreArray(m_rhs, &raw_rhs);
1068 
1069  // Import initial solution
1070  int nColumns;
1071  VecGetLocalSize(m_solution, &nColumns);
1072 
1073  PetscScalar *raw_solution;
1074  VecGetArray(m_solution, &raw_solution);
1075  for (int i = 0; i < nColumns; ++i) {
1076  raw_solution[i] = (*solution)[i];
1077  }
1078  VecRestoreArray(m_solution, &raw_solution);
1079 }
1080 
1086 void SystemSolver::vectorsExport(std::vector<double> *solution)
1087 {
1088  int size;
1089  VecGetLocalSize(m_solution, &size);
1090 
1091  const PetscScalar *raw_solution;
1092  VecGetArrayRead(m_solution, &raw_solution);
1093  for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
1094  (*solution)[i] = raw_solution[i];
1095  }
1096  VecRestoreArrayRead(m_solution, &raw_solution);
1097 }

1214 
1227 void SystemSolver::dump(const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix,
1228  DumpFormat matrixFormat, DumpFormat rhsFormat,
1229  DumpFormat solutionFormat) const
1230 {
1231  std::stringstream filePathStream;
1232 
1233  // Matrix
1234  PetscViewerType matrixViewerType;
1235  PetscViewerFormat matrixViewerFormat;
1236  if (matrixFormat == DUMP_BINARY) {
1237  matrixViewerType = PETSCVIEWERBINARY;
1238  matrixViewerFormat = PETSC_VIEWER_DEFAULT;
1239  } else {
1240  matrixViewerType = PETSCVIEWERASCII;
1241  matrixViewerFormat = PETSC_VIEWER_ASCII_MATLAB;
1242  }
1243 
1244  PetscViewer matViewer;
1245 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1246  PetscViewerCreate(m_communicator, &matViewer);
1247 #else
1248  PetscViewerCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF, &matViewer);
1249 #endif
1250  PetscViewerSetType(matViewer, matrixViewerType);
1251  PetscViewerFileSetMode(matViewer, FILE_MODE_WRITE);
1252  PetscViewerPushFormat(matViewer, matrixViewerFormat);
1253 
1254  filePathStream.str(std::string());
1255  filePathStream << directory << "/" << prefix << "A.txt";
1256  PetscViewerFileSetName(matViewer, filePathStream.str().c_str());
1257  MatView(m_A, matViewer);
1258  PetscViewerDestroy(&matViewer);
1259 
1260  // RHS
1261  PetscViewerType rhsViewerType;
1262  PetscViewerFormat rhsViewerFormat;
1263  if (rhsFormat == DUMP_BINARY) {
1264  rhsViewerType = PETSCVIEWERBINARY;
1265  rhsViewerFormat = PETSC_VIEWER_DEFAULT;
1266  } else {
1267  rhsViewerType = PETSCVIEWERASCII;
1268  rhsViewerFormat = PETSC_VIEWER_ASCII_MATLAB;
1269  }
1270 
1271  PetscViewer rhsViewer;
1272 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1273  PetscViewerCreate(m_communicator, &rhsViewer);
1274 #else
1275  PetscViewerCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF, &rhsViewer);
1276 #endif
1277  PetscViewerSetType(rhsViewer, rhsViewerType);
1278  PetscViewerFileSetMode(rhsViewer, FILE_MODE_WRITE);
1279  PetscViewerPushFormat(rhsViewer, rhsViewerFormat);
1280 
1281  filePathStream.str(std::string());
1282  filePathStream << directory << "/" << prefix << "rhs.txt";
1283  PetscViewerFileSetName(rhsViewer, filePathStream.str().c_str());
1284  VecView(m_rhs, rhsViewer);
1285  PetscViewerDestroy(&rhsViewer);
1286 
1287  // Solution
1288  PetscViewerType solutionViewerType;
1289  PetscViewerFormat solutionViewerFormat;
1290  if (solutionFormat == DUMP_BINARY) {
1291  solutionViewerType = PETSCVIEWERBINARY;
1292  solutionViewerFormat = PETSC_VIEWER_DEFAULT;
1293  } else {
1294  solutionViewerType = PETSCVIEWERASCII;
1295  solutionViewerFormat = PETSC_VIEWER_ASCII_MATLAB;
1296  }
1297 
1298  PetscViewer solutionViewer;
1299 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1300  PetscViewerCreate(m_communicator, &solutionViewer);
1301 #else
1302  PetscViewerCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF, &solutionViewer);
1303 #endif
1304  PetscViewerSetType(solutionViewer, solutionViewerType);
1305  PetscViewerFileSetMode(solutionViewer, FILE_MODE_WRITE);
1306  PetscViewerPushFormat(solutionViewer, solutionViewerFormat);
1307 
1308  filePathStream.str(std::string());
1309  filePathStream << directory << "/" << prefix << "solution.txt";
1310  PetscViewerFileSetName(solutionViewer, filePathStream.str().c_str());
1311  VecView(m_solution, solutionViewer);
1312  PetscViewerDestroy(&solutionViewer);
1313 }
1314 
1318 void SystemSolver::setNullSpace()
1319 {
1320  MatNullSpace nullspace;
1321 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1322  MatNullSpaceCreate(m_communicator, PETSC_TRUE, 0, NULL, &nullspace);
1323 #else
1324  MatNullSpaceCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF, PETSC_TRUE, 0, NULL, &nullspace);
1325 #endif
1326  MatSetNullSpace(m_A, nullspace);
1327  MatNullSpaceDestroy(&nullspace);
1328 }
1329 
1333 void SystemSolver::unsetNullSpace()
1334 {
1335  MatSetNullSpace(m_A, NULL);
1336 }
1337 
1341 void SystemSolver::setUp()
1342 {
1343  // Check if the system is assembled
1344  if (!isAssembled()) {
1345  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to solve the system. The system is not yet assembled.");
1346  }
1347 
1348  // Destroy existing Krylov space
1349  if (m_KSP) {
1350  KSPDestroy(&m_KSP);
1351  }
1352 
1353  // Create Krylov space
1354 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1355  KSPCreate(m_communicator, &m_KSP);
1356 #else
1357  KSPCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF, &m_KSP);
1358 #endif
1359 
1360  // Set options prefix
1361  if (!m_prefix.empty()) {
1362  KSPSetOptionsPrefix(m_KSP, m_prefix.c_str());
1363  }
1364 
1365  // Set the matrix associated with the linear system
1366  KSPSetOperators(m_KSP, m_A, m_A);
1367 
1368  // Perform actions before KSP set up
1369  preKSPSetupActions();
1370 
1371  // Setup Krylov space
1372  m_optionsEditable = false;
1373  KSPSetFromOptions(m_KSP);
1374  KSPSetUp(m_KSP);
1375 
1376  // Perform actions after KSP set up
1377  postKSPSetupActions();
1378 
1379  // Set up is now complete
1380  m_setUp = true;
1381 }
1382 
1386 void SystemSolver::preKSPSetupActions()
1387 {
1388  // Preconditioner configuration
1389  PCType preconditionerType;
1390 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI == 1
1391  if (isPartitioned()) {
1392  preconditionerType = PCASM;
1393  } else {
1394  preconditionerType = PCILU;
1395  }
1396 #else
1397  preconditionerType = PCILU;
1398 #endif
1399 
1400  PC preconditioner;
1401  KSPGetPC(m_KSP, &preconditioner);
1402  PCSetType(preconditioner, preconditionerType);
1403  if (strcmp(preconditionerType, PCASM) == 0) {
1404  if (m_KSPOptions.overlap != PETSC_DEFAULT) {
1405  PCASMSetOverlap(preconditioner, m_KSPOptions.overlap);
1406  }
1407  } else if (strcmp(preconditionerType, PCILU) == 0) {
1408  if (m_KSPOptions.levels != PETSC_DEFAULT) {
1409  PCFactorSetLevels(preconditioner, m_KSPOptions.levels);
1410  }
1411  }
1412 
1413  // Solver configuration
1414  KSPSetType(m_KSP, KSPFGMRES);
1415  if (m_KSPOptions.restart != PETSC_DEFAULT) {
1416  KSPGMRESSetRestart(m_KSP, m_KSPOptions.restart);
1417  }
1418  if (m_KSPOptions.rtol != PETSC_DEFAULT || m_KSPOptions.maxits != PETSC_DEFAULT) {
1419  KSPSetTolerances(m_KSP, m_KSPOptions.rtol, PETSC_DEFAULT, PETSC_DEFAULT, m_KSPOptions.maxits);
1420  }
1421  KSPSetInitialGuessNonzero(m_KSP, PETSC_TRUE);
1422 }
1423 
1427 void SystemSolver::postKSPSetupActions()
1428 {
1429  // Get preconditioner information
1430  PC preconditioner;
1431  KSPGetPC(m_KSP, &preconditioner);
1432 
1433  PCType preconditionerType;
1434  PCGetType(preconditioner, &preconditionerType);
1435 
1436  // Set ASM sub block preconditioners
1437  if (strcmp(preconditionerType, PCASM) == 0) {
1438  KSP *subksp;
1439  PC subpc;
1440  PetscInt nlocal, first;
1441  PCASMGetSubKSP(preconditioner, &nlocal, &first, &subksp);
1442  for (PetscInt i = 0; i < nlocal; ++i) {
1443  KSPGetPC(subksp[i], &subpc);
1444  PCSetType(subpc, PCILU);
1445  if (m_KSPOptions.sublevels != PETSC_DEFAULT) {
1446  PCFactorSetLevels(subpc, m_KSPOptions.sublevels);
1447  }
1448  if (m_KSPOptions.subrtol != PETSC_DEFAULT) {
1449  KSPSetTolerances(subksp[i], m_KSPOptions.subrtol, PETSC_DEFAULT, PETSC_DEFAULT, PETSC_DEFAULT);
1450  }
1451  }
1452  }
1453 }
1454

1462  return m_KSPOptions;
1463 }

1495 
1502 void SystemSolver::setCommunicator(MPI_Comm communicator)
1503 {
1504  if ((communicator != MPI_COMM_NULL) && (communicator != MPI_COMM_SELF)) {
1505  MPI_Comm_dup(communicator, &m_communicator);
1506  } else {
1507  m_communicator = MPI_COMM_SELF;
1508  }
1509 }
1510 
1514 void SystemSolver::freeCommunicator()
1515 {
1516  if (m_communicator != MPI_COMM_SELF) {
1517  int finalizedCalled;
1518  MPI_Finalized(&finalizedCalled);
1519  if (!finalizedCalled) {
1520  MPI_Comm_free(&m_communicator);
1521  }
1522  }
1523 }
1524 #endif
1525 
1526 }
